package_spec.name: Custom Tagging - Add Tags API TEST
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"maxChars":0,"validationExpressions":[{"expression":"\\S","helpString":"You must enter a value","flags":"","model":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression","parameterType":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression"}],"label":"Add tags (space-delimited)","key":"$1","restrict":null,"value":"","helpString":"Enter tags space-delimited.","promptText":"e.g. PCI DMZ Decomm","defaultValue":"","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"}],"model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
